name: ListZoomMeetingRegistrants
description:
Retrieve registered users for a Zoom meeting.

Use this tool to list all users registered for a specific Zoom meeting. It requires a Pro or higher plan and registration must be enabled for the meeting. Ideal for hosts or users with admin permissions to access detailed registrant information.

parameters.name: meeting_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Zoom meeting. Store this as a long integer to accommodate large values over 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, store it as a long format integer, not an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

parameters.name: meeting_occurrence_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a specific occurrence of a meeting or webinar.

value_schema.description: The meeting or webinar occurrence ID.

parameters.name: registrant_status
parameters.description: Filter registrants by their status: `pending`, `approved`, or `denied`.

value_schema.description:
Query by the registrant's status. 
* `pending` - The registration is pending. 
* `approved` - The registrant is approved. 
* `denied` - The registration is denied.

parameters.name: number_of_records_per_call
parameters.description: The number of registrant records to return in one API call. Determines the batch size.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: pagination_page_number_deprecated
parameters.description: Deprecated. Do not use. Use `next_page_token` for pagination instead.

value_schema.description: **Deprecated.** We will no longer support this field in a future release. Instead, use the `next_page_token` for pagination.

parameters.name: pagination_next_page_token
parameters.description: Use this token to paginate through results. It expires in 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.
